name: Seeker Tactics Trial: A Whirlwind
description: In order to learn the basic tactics of Seeker, challenge the trial of the Training Chapel
steps: Speak with Wilson in the Training Chapel
Attack an enemy with Scarlet Kisses
Avoid enemy attacks with Forward Roll
Successfully hit an enemy with Rope Throw
Cling to the enemy in the inner sanctum, and attack it with Scarlet Slashes
Collect the proof of completing the trial
Report back to Renton in the White Dragon Temple
